comments.body: I think we can skip the rule.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> I think we can skip the rule.

cc: @rjmholt

In #15620, should the rule be enabled as a suggestion, or silent?

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body: Spoke to the maintainers about this, and the consensus is for the rule to be silent.
